articles.title: Lorraine Kelly shut down by rail boss Mick Lynch over strike 'celebrity' probe' - Express

articles.title: Shania Twain cuts casual figure in black hoodie and blue jeans while arriving in New York City - Daily Mail
articles.description: Shania Twain looked relaxed while arriving at John F. Kennedy International Airport in New York City. The 57-year-old Canadian country singer wore a simple black hoodie.
